question_list.question: Dry Run: What is Quadratic Voting (QV)
question_list.description:
This is a playground designed to help you understand how to use Quadratic Voting after going through the instruction above.

Your friend is asking for your preference for the type of food to get for the dinner party tonight. Please cast up and down votes for each of the cuisine listed. In this example, you are given a total of 20 voice credits.

Please play around with the votes. When you are ready, submit your results and move on. We will be testing your understanding of Quadratic Voting on the next page, so please make sure you understand how QV works.
